attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: charge entrance to our country there are to any wagons coming into our country that dont pay anything fuel or road tax we should think about charging them before we charge our own people who pay to use our roads through road tax and fuel tax i think the pm must start looking into charging them before road charging us mormal hard working people who earn the min wage . labour should think they would not be in power if it was not for them so i say to him think before charging us because it will be that last thing this country will stand for

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
